net.derquinse.common.util.zip

Class GZIP

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.base.NotInstantiable
      • net.derquinse.common.util.zip.GZIP

  • public final class GZIP
extends NotInstantiable
    Provides utility methods for working with gzip streams. All method parameters must be non-null unless documented otherwise.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BytesTransformer compression()
      Returns a GZIP compression transformer.
      static BytesTransformer decompression()
      Returns a GZIP decompression transformer.
      static Function<ByteSource,MemoryByteSource> gunzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
      Returns a function performing GZIP decompression.
      static Function<ByteSource,MemoryByteSource> gzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
      Returns a function performing GZIP compression.
      static Function<MemoryByteSource,MaybeCompressed<MemoryByteSource>> maybeGzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
      Function version of maybeGzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader, MemoryByteSource).
      static MaybeCompressed<MemoryByteSource> maybeGzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader, MemoryByteSource input)
      Compress the input with gzip if the input is longer than 128 bytes and the output is smaller than the input.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Compress the input with gzip if the input is longer than 128 bytes and the output is smaller than the input.

      • maybeGzip

        public static Function<MemoryByteSource,MaybeCompressed<MemoryByteSource>> maybeGzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
        Function version of maybeGzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader, MemoryByteSource). IOExceptions are thrown as UncheckedExecutionExceptions.

      • gzip

        public static Function<ByteSource,MemoryByteSource> gzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
        Returns a function performing GZIP compression. IOExceptions are thrown as UncheckedExecutionExceptions.

      • gunzip

        public static Function<ByteSource,MemoryByteSource> gunzip(MemoryByteSourceLoader loader)
        Returns a function performing GZIP decompression. IOExceptions are thrown as UncheckedExecutionExceptions.
